title: PR announces fare reduction for passenger trains
content:
LAHORE, Aug 01 (APP):Pakistan Railways on Thursday notified to reduce fares for all classes of passenger trains across the country with effect from August 3, Saturday.
According to the notification, Rs 100 to 150 have been reduced for AC class ticket while Rs 50 cut for economy class.
The aim of reducing rail fares is to making train travel more affordable and accessible for the public.
